pages.text: Void chestplate is a indestructible chestplate.

pages.title: Void Chestplate
pages.text: When you wear void chestplate you can $(9)immune damage from heat$() even magma. if you like $(l:goldens_additions:misc/potion)selling your soul$() to someone. I promise that you will never see the evil. And you can fix all void tools and armors by void mixture. All void armor can make piglin friendly

pages.title: Void Chestplate(Elytra)
pages.text: If you get aelytra, you can equip it on void chestplate , very easy just smithing.
